verses.text: And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w consulted|strong="H3289"\w* with the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* and \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, \add and\add* with every \w leader|strong="H5057"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, If \add it seem\add* \w good|strong="H2895"\w* unto you, and \add that it be\add* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, let us \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w abroad|strong="H6555"\w* unto our \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* every where, \add that are\add* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and with them \add also\add* to the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add which are\add* in their \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \add and\add* \w suburbs|strong="H4054"\w*, that they may \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* themselves unto us:\f + \fr 13.2 \ft send…: Heb. break forth and send\f*\f + \fr 13.2 \ft in their…: Heb. in the cities of their suburbs\f*

And let us bring \w again|strong="H5437"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to us: for we \w enquired|strong="H1875"\w* not at it in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.\f + \fr 13.3 \ft bring…: Heb. bring about\f*

And all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* that they would do \w so|strong="H6213"\w*: for the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* was \w right|strong="H3474"\w* in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, from \w Shihor|strong="H7883"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* even unto the \w entering|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Hemath|strong="H2574"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* from \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, to \w Baalah|strong="H1173"\w*, \add that is\add*, to \w Kirjath-jearim|strong="H7157"\w*, which \add belonged\add* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, to bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* thence the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* \add between\add* the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*, whose \w name|strong="H8034"\w* is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \add on it\add*.

And they \w carried|strong="H7392"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w cart|strong="H5699"\w* out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Abinadab|strong="H0041"\w*: and \w Uzza|strong="H5798"\w* and \w Ahio|strong="H0283"\w* \w drave|strong="H5090"\w* the \w cart|strong="H5699"\w*.\f + \fr 13.7 \ft carried…: Heb. made the ark to ride\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w played|strong="H7832"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with all \add their\add* \w might|strong="H5797"\w*, and with \w singing|strong="H7892"\w*, and with \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, and with \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w*, and with \w timbrels|strong="H8596"\w*, and with \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w*, and with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*.\f + \fr 13.8 \ft singing: Heb. songs\f*

¶ And when they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w threshingfloor|strong="H1637"\w* of \w Chidon|strong="H3592"\w*, \w Uzza|strong="H5798"\w* put \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*; for the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* \w stumbled|strong="H8058"\w*.\f + \fr 13.9 \ft Chidon: also called Nachon\f*\f + \fr 13.9 \ft stumbled: or, shook it\f*

And the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Uzza|strong="H5798"\w*, and he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* him, because he \w put|strong="H7971"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* to the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*: and there he \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w displeased|strong="H2734"\w*, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w made|strong="H6555"\w* a \w breach|strong="H6556"\w* upon \w Uzza|strong="H5798"\w*: wherefore that \w place|strong="H4725"\w* is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Perez-uzza|strong="H6560"\w* to this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 13.11 \ft Perez-uzza: that is, The breach of Uzza\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w How|strong="H1963"\w* shall I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add home\add* to me?

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w brought|strong="H5493"\w* not the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \add home\add* to himself to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, but carried it \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* the \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w*.\f + \fr 13.13 \ft brought: Heb. removed\f*

And the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w remained|strong="H3427"\w* with the \w family|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w* in his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*. And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Obed-edom|strong="H5654"\w*, and all that he had.
